item.description: 1ï¸âƒ£ DreamHack Web Beginner_Cookie ë¬¸ì œí™•ì¸ (https://dreamhack.io/wargame/challenges/6) í’€ì´ ğŸ“œë¬¸ì œí™•ì¸ ë“œë¦¼í•µ ì‚¬ì´íŠ¸ì—ì„œ ë¬¸ì œ í™•ì¸ ì„œë²„ ì˜¤í”ˆ í›„ ì ‘ì†í•˜ë©´ ì•„ë˜ì™€ ê°™ì´ ê°„ë‹¨í•œ ë¡œê·¸ì¸ í˜ì´ì§€ í™•ì¸ ë¬¸ì œíŒŒì¼ ë‹¤ìš´í›„ ì½”ë“œ í™•ì¸ ê°€ëŠ¥ #!/usr/bin/python3 from flask import Flask, request, render_template, make_response, redirect, url_for app = Flask(__name__) try: FLAG = open('./flag.txt', 'r').read() except: FLAG = '[**FLAG**]' users = { 'guest': 'guest', 'admin': FLAG } @app.route('/') def index(): username = request.cookies.get('username', None) if username: return render_template('index.html', text=f'Hello {username}, {"flag is " + FLAG if username == "admin" else "you are not admin"}') return render_template('index.
